00020 #ifndef H_RAGENT_CONFIG_PAIR
00021 #define H_RAGENT_CONFIG_PAIR
00022 
00023 #include <rdkcore/container/container.h>
00024 
00025 namespace RDK2 { namespace RAgent {
00026 
00027     using namespace RDK2::Containers;
00028 
00029     struct Pair: public RDK2::Object  {
00030         string url;
00031         RDK2::Object *value;
00032         
00033         Pair() : url("undefined"), value(0) {}
00034         
00035         Pair(cstr s, RDK2::Object*v) : url(s), value(v) {}
00036         
00037         void read(Reader*r) throw (ReadingException) {
00038             r->startReading("Pair");
00039             url = r->readString();
00040             value = static_cast<Object*>(r->readObject());
00041             r->doneReading();
00042         }
00043         
00044         void write(Writer*w) const throw (WritingException) {
00045             if(!value)
00046                 throw WritingException("Could not serialize Pair with null value.");
00047 
00048             w->startWriting("Pair");
00049                 w->writeString(url);
00050                 w->writeObject(true, value);
00051             w->doneWriting();
00052         }
00053         
00054         RDK2::Object * clone() const { return new Pair(*this); }
00055     };
00056     
00057     typedef RDK2::Containers::Vector<Pair> PropertyList;
00058         
00059 }} // namespace RDK2::RAgent
00060 
00061 #endif
